ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of KPMG LLP, Chartered Accountants, of Toronto, Ontario, as auditor of Canada Post Corporation for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2012; and appointment of the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as joint auditor the Canada Post Corporation, for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2012.
